name: Pang World - Bubble Shooter
description:
Pop all the bouncing bubbles in this top arcade game. Shoot and blast your way through 100+ fun highly addictive challenging levels. Relive the ultimate bubble shooter experience with boosters and premium designed graphics.

The ultimate legend of the 90’s arcade bubble shooter Pang or also known as Buster Bros is remade with new, highly addictive graphics but remaining true to its original form and gameplay!
Take your character on a journey around the world for free through 100 exciting and carefully made levels. All weapons of the classic Pang and Bubble Trouble are available.

How to play:
- Use the joystick to move the player right or left.
- Use the fire button to fire and burst the bubbles.
- Burst all the bubbles completely to advance to the next level.
Pang World features:
• Shoot all the bubbles in this exciting bubble shooting game
• Special boosters to help you pass those tricky levels!
• Choose a skin for you character to increase the fun
• Leader boards to watch your friends and competitors!
• A free & easy to play bubble shooter, challenging to master!

Pang World is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.
Start the bubble bursting experience today!

Have fun playing Pang World!
